title.narrative: 8.1: PROGRAMME COORDINATION

description.narrative: Programme coordination and crosscutting support are properly done, which contributes to Policy, Guidance And Technical Support For Country Programming And Reporting, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Equity House Security

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Programme coordination and crosscutting support are properly done

description.narrative: UNICEF South Africa proactively led the process of the UN Sustainable Development Cooperation Framework (UNSDCF) development process, and partly due to the strategic role that UNICEF played, the UNSDCF is almost finalized. UNICEF also improved the internal coordination and governance to enhance its development effectiveness. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/01/2020
